snippet: The Metropolitan Opera’s HD broadcasts to movie theaters brings its productions to the rest of America and the world, with a range of consequences for audiences and other opera companies.
abstract: Metropolitan Opera’s HD broadcasts of performances to movie theaters are reshaping the experiences of audiences and smaller opera companies.
